column4: anyone who knows how i can retrieve my files ? ubuntu crashes while booting gnome
have you tried another window manager? or plain console (tty1)?
you could just do "sudo apt-get install kubuntu-desktop" which would install all KDE relevant packages, then from the login window (gdm) choose KDE and hope that it does not lockup.

You'd have to remove all the packages again, that you do not want/need (quite a lot then actually). It would probably better to "sudo apt-get install xfce4" then. It gets also installed as an alternative desktop environment.
